name: environment-guard
description: Verifies that knowzcode/environment_context.md no longer contains placeholder brackets.

actions.code:
from pathlib import Path
text = Path('knowzcode/environment_context.md').read_text()
placeholders = [line.strip() for line in text.splitlines() if '[' in line and ']' in line]
if placeholders:
    raise ValueError('environment_context.md still contains placeholders: ' + ', '.join(placeholders[:5]))
